The claim states that the line: my loneliness is killing me" in Britney Spears' song "... Baby One More Time" was an English translation of a line from Alexandre Dumas' novel "The Count of Monte Cristo."
The expert: s review of the unexpurgated edition of the classic French text found that the book did not include the verbatim phrase "ma solitude me tue, j’avoue que je continue de croire."
Based on the evidence: the expert rates the claim as "False" since the alleged line does not appear in the original French text of "Le Comte de Monte-Cristo."
